text:
@realDonaldTrump @MariaBartiromo Anyone think that, under a President Hillary Clinton, in week 10 of sheltering-in-place, Philadelphia would be emerging from its 8th consecutive mandatory 8PM to 6 AM curfew, armed US troops patrolling its streets, as COVID-19 kills 107,000 of us, while she tweets lies?

#MAGA ??
